announcements.name: [October 26] SkyBlock Patch Notes
announcements.description: Hey all! We are here to inform you about the latest update that was just rolled to SkyBlock!

announcements.name: SkyBlock Patch Notes 0.19.6 - The Great Spook, Essence Shops, & More
announcements.description: Hello! Welcome to SkyBlock Patch 0.19.6. This update contains permanent Spooky content in the form of The Great Spook, several additions and changes to Essence Shops, and much more!
